meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before the development of writing.
meanings.sent1: The cave paintings are a preliterary form of communication.
meanings.sent2: The ancient oral traditions are considered preliterary.
meanings.sent3: The preliterary stories were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent4: The preliterary era was a time of spoken legends.
meanings.sent5: The preliterary culture relied on oral storytelling for history.

meanings.definition: Relating to a time before written records.
meanings.sent1: The artifacts from the preliterary period provide insight into ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study preliterary societies to understand early human history.
meanings.sent3: The preliterary artifacts were discovered in a hidden cave.
meanings.sent4: The preliterary era is shrouded in mystery without written accounts.
meanings.sent5: Exploring preliterary cultures reveals fascinating glimpses of the past.
